p.props: cpp ios mac unreal bp unity flutter electron rn cs

pd.p:
Facial enhancement areas.
-1: (Default) Invalid area; facial enhancement effects do not take effect.
100: Head, used to achieve a smaller head effect. The adjustment range is [0,100]; the larger the value, the smaller the head becomes, with a preset value of 100.
101: Forehead, which adjusts the height of the hairline. The adjustment range is [-100,100]; positive values make the hairline higher, while negative values make it lower. The larger the value, the stronger the enhancement effect, with a preset value of 20.
102: Face contour, used to achieve a slimmer face effect. The adjustment range is [0,100]; the larger the value, the stronger the slimming effect, with a preset value of 10.
103: Face length, used to achieve a longer face effect. The adjustment range is [-100,100]; positive values elongate the face, while negative values shorten it. The larger the value, the stronger the enhancement effect, with a preset value of 0.
104: Face width, used to achieve a narrower face effect. The adjustment range is [0,100]; the larger the value, the stronger the narrowing effect, with a preset value of 10.
105: Cheekbone, used to adjust the cheekbone width. The adjustment range is [0,100]; the larger the value, the narrower the cheekbones, with a preset set value of 43.
106: Cheeks, used to adjust the cheeks width. The adjustment range is [0,100]; the larger the value, the narrower the cheeks, with a preset value of 50.
108: Chin, used to adjust the chin length. The adjustment range is [-100,100]; positive values elongate the chin, while negative values shorten it. The larger the value, the stronger the enhancement effect, with a preset value of -20.
200:Eyes, used to achieve a larger eye effect. The adjustment range is [0,100]; the larger the value, the larger the eye size, with a preset value of 50.
(201)：眼距调整。 The value range is [0.0,1.0], and the default value is 0. 绝对值越大，调整效果越明显，负值表示相反方向。
(202)：眼位调整。 The value range is [0.0,1.0], and the default value is 0. 绝对值越大，调整效果越明显，负值表示相反方向。
(203)：下眼睑调整。 The value range is [0,1], and the default value is 0. 值越大，调整效果越明显。
(204)：眼珠调整。 The value range is [0,1], and the default value is 0. 值越大，调整效果越明显。
(205)：眼角调整。 The value range is [0,1], and the default value is 0. 值越大，调整效果越明显。
(206)：眼角调整。 The value range is [0,1], and the default value is 0. 值越大，调整效果越明显。
300: Nose length, used to achieve a longer nose effect. The adjustment range is [-100,100]; positive values elongate the nose, while negative values shorten it. The larger the value, the stronger the enhancement effect, with a preset value of -10.
301: Nose width, used to achieve a slimmer nose effect. The adjustment range is [-100,100]; positive values make the nose wider, while negative values make it narrower. The larger the value, the stronger the enhancement effect, with a preset value of 72.
(302)：鼻翼调整。 The value range is [0,1], and the default value is 0. 值越大，调整效果越明显。
(303)：鼻根调整。 The value range is [0,1], and the default value is 0. 值越大，调整效果越明显。
(304)：鼻梁调整。 The value range is [0,1], and the default value is 0. 值越大，调整效果越明显。
(305)：鼻尖调整。 The value range is [0,1], and the default value is 0. 值越大，调整效果越明显。
(306)：鼻子整体调整。 The value range is [0,1], and the default value is 0. 值越大，调整效果越明显。
(400)：嘴巴，用于实现大嘴效果。 The adjustment range is [0,100]; the larger the value, the larger the eye size, with a preset value of 53.
(401)：嘴巴位置调整。 The value range is [0.0,1.0], and the default value is 0. 绝对值越大，调整效果越明显，负值表示相反方向。
(402)：嘴巴微笑调整。 The value range is [0,1], and the default value is 0. 值越大，调整效果越明显。
(403)：嘴巴唇形调整。 The value range is [0,1], and the default value is 0. 值越大，调整效果越明显。
(500)：眉毛位置调整。 The value range is [0.0,1.0], and the default value is 0. 绝对值越大，调整效果越明显，负值表示相反方向。
(501)：眉毛粗细调整。 The value range is [0,1], and the default value is 0. 值越大，调整效果越明显。

plentry.pd: The intensity of the enhancement. The definition of enhancement intensity varies according to the different face areas, such as its orientation, range, and preset value.For details, see descriptions in shapeArea. See .
